name: iThoughts Lightbox
author: Gerkin

sections.description:
This plugin allow you to create lightboxes with following functionnalities:

  • select the images you want to include/exclude from the lightbox with the TinyMCE new Lightbox button
  • create lightboxes with title and caption
  • zoom on images that can be displayed bigger with the JS library ImageZoom
  • merge with iThoughts Tooltip Glossary, and allow to include into lightboxes the mediatips you select
  • create easily new transitions, animations or theme with the incoming patterns available at GerkinDevelopment official page

For more informations, please visit the dedicated plugin page
sections.installation:
Either install through admin panel (this is the eaiest way), or:

  1. Upload ithoughts-lightbox.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Unzip the archive
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

Options will be available into Settings > iThoughts Lightbox
